name: Union (itch) (Cakiws)
description:
Una is trapped in an inhospitable place in search of her true motive, her powers have spread throughout the map due to an inexpicable force, she must collect all her powers and thus be able to assemble the door and search for her main objective.

Controls:

WASD: Move

Space: Jump

Mouse: Camera move

ESC: Exit the game

Alt + Enter: Fullscreen

Bonus:

Ctrl + Shift + H (in-game): Hard mode
